TopicTitle: What's up with the 3.75m stack decoupler?

Articles.Content:
The 3.75m decoupler still doesn't decouple correctly when used in symmetry (decouples only one by one). It's quite an old issue, dating back a few versions, and usually solved by setting "PhysicsSignificance = 1" to "0".

So what's up with that? Always seemed like a bug to me, I think some dev even said it was an oversight and it got fixed? Doesn't seem make sense to me to make a decoupler massless in the first place, especially when every other decoupler/seperator isn't.

Edited March 26, 2016 by Temeter

Hmmm.... Not sure..

Are you running the latest KSP version?

Some more info like pics or something might help too.

Happy Flying

YargJay9991
